1.title: Un nuovo anno

episode of.title: Talent High School - Il sogno di Sofia (TV Series 2012– )

1.plot: Sofia is getting ready to go back to be a sales engineer, but there is a treat for her: De Magistriis sent his daughter to an exclusive college in Switzerland and wants Sofia to substitute her at Talent High School and give the family name a good reputation. Sofia can follow her dream going undercover.As Allegra returns to Talent High School she meets Patrick, an Irish-Italian who is there as an exchange student.

2.title: Il maestro d'amore

episode of.title: Talent High School - Il sogno di Sofia (TV Series 2012– )

2.plot: Bart and Allegra, the best dancers in the school, will be part of the International Dance Competition, which Talent High School is hosting this year.However they barely speak to each other:Bart refuses to dance with Allegra, so that they will be rivals.There is a new challenge thrown by the professor: to fulfill a dream by facing the fear that prevents its fulfillment. Bart dreams to work with cars, so he goes back to the shop and ask Sirio for help to develop and build an engine to win a three-month internship at the Indianapolis Motor Speedway.

3.title: Lo sport rivelatore

episode of.title: Talent High School - Il sogno di Sofia (TV Series 2012– )

3.plot: Prof. De Blasi wants each student to find the sport that suits with their personalities. Patrick, who was a star boxer, will be the coach and will deal with Greg, who is challenging an old school mate to a weight-lifting competition. Everyone seems enthusiastic, except for Bart.

4.title: Un fitto mistero

episode of.title: Talent High School - Il sogno di Sofia (TV Series 2012– )

4.plot: After a quarrel with the dean of the school prof De Blasi disappears and the students are very worried about him. While there is an investigation to find out what happened to him, Marion begins to create some tutorials in which she portrays herself as a fashion and style icon.

5.title: Ereditarietà

episode of.title: Talent High School - Il sogno di Sofia (TV Series 2012– )

5.plot: The students are divided up in couples to become parents for a day. The couples are:Greta and Patrick, Marion and Greg and Allegra and Bart.But it's difficult being parents, especially when the two are so different from each other!Greg discovers that his ancestors were all bald,so that he must overthrow the laws of genetics!

6.title: Un Halloween da paura

episode of.title: Talent High School - Il sogno di Sofia (TV Series 2012– )

6.plot: It's Halloween, but it is also the day of the first out of three intermediate challenge for the International Dance Competition. The professor decides to welcome their guests making a short horror film: Greg will be the director. but Greta warns everyone: you can't make a short horror film on Halloween without escaping the curse of Halloween!Meanwhile Allegra and Bart have a difficult challenge: Not only they are competing against one another in the first competition, but they also need to be as good as the team they are up against.Allegra, heavily pressured by De ...

7.title: Un legame soffocante

episode of.title: Talent High School - Il sogno di Sofia (TV Series 2012– )

7.plot: After witnessing a fight among some students he punishes them: they have to live out an whole day tied to one of the others, to learn about the other's life and share things with them. Allegra is paired with Marion, Greta with Greg and Bart with Patrick.

8.title: Uno strano caso

episode of.title: Talent High School - Il sogno di Sofia (TV Series 2012– )

8.plot: Professor De Blasi has to create the jingle for the Fashion Show, the fashion competition that Marion and Greg are participating in. They must turn in three original high tech fashions by the end of the year and the winner will win a week of fashion in Paris working with a well known stylist. De Blasi is really nervous and the students offer to help him, but there is something strange about the professor. Likewise with Greg!

9.title: Un graffito facile facile

episode of.title: Talent High School - Il sogno di Sofia (TV Series 2012– )

9.plot: For the upcoming second intermediate dance competition, the professor asks the students to decorate the classroom with graffiti. Patrick should be their leader, but he doesn't show up. Bart wants replace him, but you can't improvise being an artist, so that he has to ask his friends for help. Meanwhile, Marion finds out she has a birth mark behind her right ear, something that worries her.

10.title: Nomophobia

episode of.title: Talent High School - Il sogno di Sofia (TV Series 2012– )

10.plot: The dean promises two tickets for the long-awaited Breaking Town part 5 for whoever catches the thief that's wandering around Talent High School. Patrick wants to win the tickets to bring Allegra to the show, which makes Bart extremely jealous. Bart challenges Patrick to see who'll find the thief first. The thief has even robbed from Marion. Her smart phone has been stolen and she feels lost without it. The professor says she is suffering from nomophobia. While Marion tries to "detox" herself, Bart, Allegra and Patrick are on the thief's tracks and it ends up being a ...

11.title: Un Natale in coro

episode of.title: Talent High School - Il sogno di Sofia (TV Series 2012– )

11.plot: De Blasi has to organize the Christmas concert and for the occasion has invited a very famous group of singers, the Tyrolese group from Spazzespatz. The students, convinced a different group would have sung at the concert, burst out laughing and the group is offended and leaves. Meanwhile, Greta is determined to discover the real spirit of Christmas.

12.title: Meglio soli...

episode of.title: Talent High School - Il sogno di Sofia (TV Series 2012– )

12.plot: It's the day of the second intermediate competition for the International Dance Competition against the students at Frank School. Allegra and Bart compete against each other, determined to fight until the very end.Once again, their performance is not good enough. De Blasi suggests they join forces, because they would have had more chances if they competed together.

13.title: Prof in sciopero

episode of.title: Talent High School - Il sogno di Sofia (TV Series 2012– )

13.plot: De Blasi has decided to go on strike against the dean, who has forbidden him from holding afternoon magic classes, his latest passion. The students try to find a way to reason with him, but Bart is acting strangely and seems to have fallen in love with Greta, which Allegra isn't pleased at all.

14.title: Il fantasma dell'accademia

episode of.title: Talent High School - Il sogno di Sofia (TV Series 2012– )

14.plot: The dean has imposed students to wear dismal uniforms. While Marion forces Greg to find a new uniform, Allegra, Bart and Patrick are dealing with Greta, who is convinced there is a ghost at the school and she has decided to free it from its sadness. Bart is particularly nervous. He isn't satisfied with the results of his project thus far. Sofia offers to help him if he agrees to work really hard for the Dance Competition.

15.title: Un'emergenza ecologica

episode of.title: Talent High School - Il sogno di Sofia (TV Series 2012– )

15.plot: The students must create a "green" piece of art work. Yet reconciling Marion's fashion ideas with Greta's ecological ideas and Greg's fears that the world is about to end is not easy. Bart helps Allegra because she offered to help him with his project. In fact, she gives him a suggestion on how to improve his engine. Of course, the two of them would make a fine couple indeed if Patrick wouldn't get in the way of them.

16.title: Le 10 regole

episode of.title: Talent High School - Il sogno di Sofia (TV Series 2012– )

16.plot: The masquerade ball is coming up at Talent High School. Once again, the organization of the party has been entrusted to the students. Marion is the director and conditions the entire school with her handbook on the ten rules of fashion. Bart, instead, thanks to Sofia's help, has finally finished his project. He could use the ball to help him thank Sofia, but Patrick has already reserved a dance with Allegra.

17.title: L'insegnante americana

episode of.title: Talent High School - Il sogno di Sofia (TV Series 2012– )

17.plot: Miss Onetwothree, a new dance teacher from USA has arrived at the school- , and she is very severe: Professor De Blasi falls in love with her. The students must help him make a declaration of love. Meanwhile, Marion is busy trying to find out what Greg's secrets are for the Fashion Show.

18.title: Reality

episode of.title: Talent High School - Il sogno di Sofia (TV Series 2012– )

18.plot: Talent High School becomes the stage for the reality show SuperEye, hosted by the renown Capsula. Marion is outrageously excited, while Greg is panicking. The name of the game here is "The show must go on" no matter what.

19.title: Uno scoop da prima pagina

episode of.title: Talent High School - Il sogno di Sofia (TV Series 2012– )

19.plot: On the occasion of the third intermediate competition for the International Dance Competition, an aggressive reporter shows up at the school to interview Allegra and Bart, convinced he has found out the truth. Meanwhile, Marion is sure the only way to win the Fashion Show is by joining forces with Greg and suddenly becomes very sweet to him. At the Dance Competition, Bart and Allegra finally achieve some positive results and expectations are high for the finals. The students are all very excited, but Bart receives a phone call. He's won the internship at the ...

20.title: Il segreto in cucina

episode of.title: Talent High School - Il sogno di Sofia (TV Series 2012– )

20.plot: Cooking is art, and must be treated as art. The students are divided up into teams and have to create a culinary masterpiece. But the dynamics of each team aren't the easiest. Bart has a secret he has to tell to Allegra, but she's on Patrick's team. In a moment of jealousy, he tells Allegra he won't participate in the finals of the dance competition with her, with no explanation. Patrick comes to Allegra's rescue- he'll dance with her in the finals! Allegra is so grateful, she just might not withdraw from the sweet kiss she gives Patrick.

21.title: A lezione di bon ton

episode of.title: Talent High School - Il sogno di Sofia (TV Series 2012– )

21.plot: Miss Strawberry, an English countess who is visiting the school, must decide whether or not to give a large donation to the school. De Blasi is there to welcome her, but he doesn't exactly have the best etiquette, which is fundamental for the countess. So the students have to help him! Meanwhile, Greta and Greg test Marion. They need to find out if she is being sweet to Greg only so because he is helping her with the Fashion Show. She seems to pass all the tests until Greg finds the gift he gave her in the garbage can. Marion lied!

22.title: Cioccolato amaro

episode of.title: Talent High School - Il sogno di Sofia (TV Series 2012– )

22.plot: Patrick asks Allegra to arrange a meeting for him with Dark Chocolate, a successful band. Bart warns Allegra about Patrick's real intentions while Greg tries to find inspiration to finish the sketches that he has to send in for the Fashion Show against Marion. Patrick tries to keep Bart and Allegra apart. In fact, he finds out that Bart isn't participating in the International Dance Competition because he won the internship in Indianapolis. He tells Allegra and she is very disappointed that Bart didn't tell her himself. Bart confronts Patrick and discovers how cynical...

23.title: Blackout

episode of.title: Talent High School - Il sogno di Sofia (TV Series 2012– )

23.plot: A terrible storm destroys communications lines at the school just when everyone was waiting for some important news, like the results for the Fashion Show and the rankings for the dance competition. The students are trapped at school. Greta decides to write a fantasy story based on this current adventure. At the end of the day, the lines are up and running and they finally learn the results. Allegra and Patrick are ranked fourth in the pre-finals of the International Dance Competition, while Greg has won the Fashion Show competition! Marion, instead, cheated and was ...

24.title: L'International Dance Competition

episode of.title: Talent High School - Il sogno di Sofia (TV Series 2012– )

24.plot: The finals of the dance competition have arrived. Allegra is very nervous, even De Magistriis has come to pressure "his daughter". Finally Patrick arrives, but he fell and his arm is in a cast. Now what is Allegra going to do! But Patrick's cast suddenly falls off...it was all a hoax so he didn't have to compete. He won't participate unless he is certain of winning, and the fact that they are ranked fourth doesn't give him any great hope. Allegra is devastated. Patrick isn't the person she thought she had come to know these last few months. All seems lost when ...

4.title: La mia migliore nemica

episode of.title: Talent High School - Il sogno di Sofia (TV Series 2012– )

4.plot: Professor De Blasi hears Marion and Allegra arguing and decides they each need to find out more about the other's life. Sofia needs Bart's help to keep her real identity a secret, while Greta helps Greg with an undesired appointment.

13.title: Una tenera canaglia

episode of.title: Talent High School - Il sogno di Sofia (TV Series 2012– )

13.plot: De Blasi gives the students his great grandmother Pierina's painting for the restoration of paintings exam. Yet the task also includes babysitting for Beatrice, a sweet, angelic-like six-year old girl who may not be so angelic after all...

18.title: Una notte in accademia

episode of.title: Talent High School - Il sogno di Sofia (TV Series 2012– )

18.plot: DeBlasi suggests a freshmen sleepover party at the school.The initial excitement fades away, however,once they begin hearing some strange and unexplainable noises.That's when they find out about the legend of Radol,the ghost of the Academy.

19.title: A volte ritornano

episode of.title: Talent High School - Il sogno di Sofia (TV Series 2012– )

19.plot: The creative painting exam. This time the judge is not De Blasi, but an external, female professor from Austria. De Blasi is quite upset when he finds out. He obviously has something to hide.

23.title: Grandi preparativi

episode of.title: Talent High School - Il sogno di Sofia (TV Series 2012– )

23.plot: The others persuade Allegra to help Marion. Greta and Greg busy themselves with costumes and sets, all while helping Greta with her memory problems. Marion gets results, but some trouble lies in store.

24.title: Il musical

episode of.title: Talent High School - Il sogno di Sofia (TV Series 2012– )

24.plot: The night of the musical has arrived and the students are out of their minds with excitement. But there are more surprises in store...

imdb.plot outline: What teenager has never dreamed of stepping onto a stage and show everyone his or her talent? Talent High School is the place where dreams become reality. Acting, fashion, singing and dancing are the main subjects taught at this highly exclusive school where no one needs to be "normal." However, they do need certain calling cards to gain access to it: attendance at equally exclusive schools and overseas experiences. As good at dancing, Sofia is just the daughter of a mechanic in the suburbs, virtually self-taught, and, as a result, is not accepted at the academy. Then, she pretends to be Allegra De Magistriis, the daughter of a Hollywood producer, born and raised like a star and who just happens to be Sofia's drop of water. Lying is not so easy, especially with people who were really born in that world. In fact, who really does not take anything to discover his secret is Bart, a talented but unbearable dancer, son of a record producer, who enjoys to see Sofia turn pale at his discovery. But Sofia is not intimidated, because, despite his talent, Bart has a totally different passion: the engine, just the one in which Sofia has been surrounded by since she was a little girl. Between one argument and the next, Sofia and Bart will make a pact: a collaboration that will bring them closer and closer to the realization of their dreams. Sofia/Allegra's companions at the Talent High School, apart from Bart, are Marion, the principal's snob daughter, Greta, a rather extravagant aspiring writer, Greg, an aspiring fashion designer with the air of a nerd, and, later, Patrick, a handsome DJ.
